data.text: @MikeCrapo Cutting red tape, promoting growth, aiding small businesses.

@MikeCrapo Iranians are asking the world for action, not politics. Human rights should never be traded for short term diplomatic comfort.
#IranMassacre  #IRANREVOLUTION2026 #R2PforIran‌
@MikeCrapo For once, do your damn job, do what’s is right for the citizens of this country not the lobbyists!! https://t.co/DPieBz3EqN

@MikeCrapo Reckless MAGA House passed a bill allowing a foreign billionaire to build a copper mine near the Boundary Waters of Minnesota. For only 20 years of profits it will pollute the St. Louis River feeding into Lake Superior indefinitely. Tell Risch NO before they vote to pass this

@MikeCrapo The Idaho Congress hasn't passed the federal deductions for seniors, tips or overtime. Why do you ignore what's really happening and instead feed us your MAGA feel-good rhetoric? You're failing your constituents while Trump threatens our elections again and defies your own laws.

@MikeCrapo Why is Trump and his intelligence director illegally interfering in Fulton County GA? That 2020 result was audited, investigated, recounted many times. His former cabinet admitted there was no fraud. He's threatening our elections again. When will you stand up for our democracy?

@MikeCrapo Please don’t stay silent.
Iranian families are suffering every day under violent repression. Innocent people are being killed simply for asking for freedom.
Your support and public statement can make a real difference.
#IranMassacre https://t.co/K4TK6pukxu
